# Acme Corporation

> Fine Products for Coyotes Since 1949

## About

Acme Corporation is the world's leading supplier of improbable contraptions,
oversized magnets, rocket-powered roller skates, and suspiciously instant tunnels
painted onto cliff faces. Headquartered in the American Southwest, Acme has been
serving the needs of ambitious predators for over seven decades.

We believe every coyote deserves access to professional-grade pursuit equipment,
regardless of prior success rate.

## Products

- Portable anvils (various sizes, free-fall tested)
- Giant rubber bands (industrial strength)
- Rocket-powered roller skates (ACME ROCKETSKATE 9000)
- Instant tunnel kits (paint-on, drive-through)
- Earthquake pills
- Dehydrated boulders (just add water)
- Bird seed (premium, roadrunner-grade)

## Contact

- Website: https://acme.example.com
- Email: sales@acme.example.com
- Support: help@acme.example.com
- Location: Desert Canyon Road, Somewhere, AZ

## Technical Notes

- This is a single-page logo site built with Astro
- Deployed on Cloudflare Pages
- Template: Lily Livered (https://github.com/vinsonconsulting/lily-livered)
